meanings.sent1: The group of scapegraces caused chaos in the park.

meanings.sent5: The teacher had a hard time controlling the class full of scapegraces.

meanings.sent1: The cunning scapegraces always managed to avoid getting caught.

meanings.sent3: The scapegraces tricked the villagers into believing a wild tale about a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent4: The leader of the gang of scapegraces was known for his silver tongue and quick wit.
